message: I'm feeling generous, but I'll need the lion's share.  Take it or leave it.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be reasonable. This is my counter-offer.
Let's be realistic.  I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to make this worth my while.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm offering a compromise. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
